message: This offer represents a fair split considering the diminishing value of money with each round. Please consider it carefully.
I'm trying to get a better share, considering the decreasing value of money.

Considering the inflation, I propose a split where we both receive an equal percentage decrease in our shares from the initial offer. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the changing value of money.
I'm pushing for a larger share, considering the continued decrease in value of money.
